Text: Good episode, i believe it is a parody of the movie Clue (witch is based off the board game and a good film) but it might just be similar. Anyways i recommend it!

@afroebob Ah, close close close...  Ok, nowhere near close! =)  Loved the episode, but it's actually based on an Agatha Christie, Ten Little N-words, later Ten Little Indians, finally And Then There Were  None.

Who'd have figured an Agatha Christie buff for a Family Guy fan?!
